Title: Authorizes the issuance of Support Recovery license plates; and authorizes the deposit of certain moneys into the opioid stewardship fund
Summary: Authorizes the issuance of "Support Recovery" license plates; and authorizes the deposit of certain moneys into the opioid stewardship fund.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; amd ยง97-aaaaa, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the issuance of "Support Recovery" license plates; to amend the state finance law, in relation to authorizing the deposit of certain moneys into the opioid stewardship fund; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
